titles.title: No longer slaves
You unravel me
I am a child of God

properties.verseOrder: v1 c v2 c b c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You unravel me, with a melody You surround me with a song Of deliverance, from my enemies Till all my fears are gone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: From my mothers womb You have chosen me Love has called my name I've been born again, into a family Your blood flows through my veins

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I'm no longer a slave to fear I am a child of God I'm no longer a slave to fear I am a child of God

verse.name: b
verse.lines: You split the sea So I could walk right through it My fears were drowned in perfect love You rescued me And I will stand and sing I am a child of God
